ip access-list extended AllowFTPAccess
	permit tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 eq 21  
	permit tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 range 50000 51000
	deny tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
	permit ip 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
